I had a great time studying in this college. The course DHMO really help me in my current state. This course really helped me to improve my knowledge and help me in my current Job. I am truly blessed studying here, Lecturer Kenny explain in details
And teach us to our understanding. This college is very Good taught me many things about House keeping and Maintenance work. I will strongly recommend TEG INTERNATIONAL COLLEGE TO MY FRIEND AND FAMILY WHOM WANT TO STUDY IN SINGAPORE

text.text:
I am writing to express my heartfelt appreciation and provide feedback on the recent holistic program organized by your school. Having participated in the activities, I am truly impressed by the thoughtful planning and the positive impact it had on everyone involved.

The program provided a wonderful opportunity for students to engage with the community, particularly with the elderly, in a meaningful and respectful manner. It was evident from the interactions and the atmosphere that the students were well-prepared, courteous, and genuinely enthusiastic about serving others. The activities were well-organized, and the students demonstrated strong teamwork and communication skills throughout the event.

What stood out most was the inclusive environment created by the program. Participants from different backgrounds came together, fostering a sense of unity and mutual respect. The students' willingness to assist, listen, and interact with the elderly was heartwarming and reflects well on the values instilled by TEG International School.

Additionally, the staff and volunteers managed the event smoothly, ensuring that everyone felt welcomed and comfortable. The attention to detail, from setting up the venue to guiding participants, contributed to a positive and enjoyable experience for all.

Overall, I believe this holistic program not only benefited the community but also provided valuable life lessons for the students. It helped nurture empathy, responsibility, and social awareness, which are essential qualities for future leaders.

Thank you once again for your dedication and for providing such a meaningful program. I look forward to seeing more initiatives like this in the future.

Warm regards,

text.text: It was a deeply rewarding experience. Spending time with elderly people gave a new perspective on life and family. I helped them serve lunch, played games with them. It was so good to meet them. I learned to appreciate the value of listening. I learned the value of money and family bond, too. I had great interaction with elderly people. They shared their beautiful life stories that touched me. It would be great to have a short training session on how to interact with elderly residents. Lastly, I would love to volunteer again and spend time with them.

They shared their beautiful life stories that touched me. It would be great to have a short training session on how to interact with elderly residents. Lastly, I would love to volunteer again and spend time with them.

text.text:
I'd like to share my reflection on the Holistic Program held on 16 April 2025.The holistic program conducted at Loving Heart Singapore was a meaningful and enriching experience. It brought together individuals from diverse backgrounds to engage in activities that nurtured not only physical and mental well-being, but also emotional and social connection.

The program was a valuable experience for me, as it helped me gain a better understanding e.g., personal,development, mental wellness, mindfulness. The sessions were engaging and informative, and I appreciated the opportunity to participate in group activities and discussions.

Iâ€™m grateful for the opportunity to have been a part of this program and look forward to similar initiatives that promote holistic growth and compassion in our communities.

text.text: My name  pratap Harsh Rana i studied this college diploma in house keeping maintenance operations this is the best college in singapore great staff super helpful they eill help till the end, unless students do something great mistakes then will lead to termination. As far they are very helpful and very kind to all the students. As student we are here to study only. But some students are problematic student the college will try to help them thier best unless things go beyond this hands then that will lead to termination.. best college in singapore i will strongly recommend
